fields.name: -Supersonic:
fields.value:
Redirect a target randomly. They will not be redirected to a Beast. **Locked**: If they don’t visit anyone, they will instead deal an Overkill Attack to themselves.
-Marching Tune: Invigorate a Beast. They will become roleblock and redirect immune for the night. **Locked**: In addition, if they are attacking, the attack will be upgraded by one tier, to a maximum of Overkill.
-Blaring Sirens (Day, **Locked**, 2-shot): Choose a target. They will be Authorized tonight, and a random player Authorized by the Sentry Power role today simply will not be Authorized.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Blasted by Songun**
-**Locked**: If you are Authorized, you will see who visits you and may choose up to 2 visitors each night to roleblock passively and astrally.
-**Unlock Condition**: If the Sentries was the largest ‘Good’ faction at the start of the game, Unlock.
